result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

Defendant Joseph Daniel Trott in court with attorney Daniel Gordon Mitchell.  Defendant Joseph Daniel Trott in custody.  James C Griffin appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: LM  
Pursuant to negotiations, case is DISMISSED BUT READ IN for the purpose of sentencing in case# 15CM929 and 15CM1893.

Attorney Daniel Gordon Mitchell in court, defendant Joseph D Trott not in court, in custody and not produced.  Kelly O'Neill appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Deputy Court Clerk: TC. Court ordered case adjourned for projected guilty plea in Branch 31.  Plea hearing scheduled for May 16, 2016 at 01:30 pm.
Defendant's Bail Forfeiture Notice returned undeliverable.

Court orders defendant TURNED OVER to JUSTICE Point for Supervision.  ABSOLUTE SOBRIETY to be monitored by drug testing and portable breathalyzers.  No use or possession of controlled substances without a valid prescription.  Defendant advised it is a requirement to attend all future court proceedings.  Failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping. 

**Defendant ordered to pay an additional $500.00 cash above any bail that remains on deposit**
Defendant advised No Contact Order remains in full force and effect.  Defendant to have no contact with Target 2600 S 108th Street, West Allis
